description:
In this course we will be looking at a simple step by step process that you can implement to make easy money, month after month by promoting Amazon products on Squidoo.,

The learning is structured in 8 step by step videos, Ideal for someone to take as It’s Free and it’s EASY, newbie friendly and detailed enough even for seasoned marketers to learn a tip or two.

The course Includes details such as

  • Picking Hot Selling Products That Win
  • Keyword Research - The Quick and Dirty Way
  • How to Create a Profit Pulling Squidoo Lens.
  • The Effective Way of Publishing and Promoting a Squidoo Lens
title: How to Utilize Squidoo and Amazon to Run an Online Business
